titleStmt.title: Curse not the King. A sermon preached at St. Martin's in the Fields, on the 30th of January, 1660. Being the anniversary day of humiliation for the horrid murder of our late gracious soveraign Charles the I. By John Meriton, M.A. rector of the church of St. Nicholas Acons, London, and lecturer to that congregation.
titleStmt.author: Meriton, John, 1636-1704.

titleStmt.title: Curse not the King. A sermon preached at St. Martin's in the Fields, on the 30th of January, 1660. Being the anniversary day of humiliation for the horrid murder of our late gracious soveraign Charles the I. By John Meriton, M.A. rector of the church of St. Nicholas Acons, London, and lecturer to that congregation.
titleStmt.author: Meriton, John, 1636-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Macock for Henry Herringman; and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Blew Anchor in the lower-walk in the New Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
